website_summaries.verdict: Proper sizing can be a challenge, but these affordable and stylish satin pajamas work well for those who seek the look and feel of silk. Some length alterations may be required, however.
pros: Polyester material has a soft satin-like quality
Material and stitching hold up well after multiple washes
cons: Top and bottom sizing can be inconsistent
Sleeves and pant legs run longer than expected

customer_reviews.title: Cheap stitching and construction
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, they were too warm for comfort, but that was partially my fault for not checking the material. The biggest problem is that everything about this was obviously cheap construction. The night mask only has a single strap along the middle; that puts uncomfortable pressure across the eyes. The stitching around the button holes was loose and would constantly catch when manipulating the buttons through the holes. The final straw was after the first washing a large seam in the elbow came undone. I've only gotten a single month's of inconsistient usage out of it before it just completely fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: M. Risher

customer_reviews.title: Size XXXL fits just as they should.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a person who likes having my bed clothing wrap itself around my body after a night of tossing and turning in my sleep, so I thought. “Hey Satin!” I read the reviews on many different sets, and this set seemed worth a try, after all, they were reasonably priced, so last night was my first night with them. I love them. I’m a big guy of 300lds and 6’ 1”, and they fit great, and best of all I won’t hang myself from my own PJ’s.
customer_reviews.author: Don B

customer_reviews.title: The only satin-style pajamas I could find with a fastener on the waistband.
customer_reviews.text: The pajamas are a little long and a little loose, but they do the job. My pajamas did not have sizing differences between the top and bottom. Both the top and bottom are sized for a man who wears a medium. The elastic waistband holds the pants up without a problem. These were the only satin-style pajamas I could find with a fastener on the waistband. I bought three pair.
customer_reviews.author: Flash2520

customer_reviews.title: easy for frail folks to turn over in bed
customer_reviews.text: Had to return medium and get a large for my little old dad, because the crotch isn't cut roomy for older men. I'm sure the sleeves will now come down to his fingertips. Otherwise, it IS slippery fabric, easy for frail folks to turn over in bed, almost an extinct fabric!
customer_reviews.author: Caribbean Gal

customer_reviews.title: The sizing is hard to understand. If you buy ...
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is hard to understand. If you buy by the waist size, the top is too big. If you order by the top size, the bottoms are too small. I had to order two sets of different sizes to make a set the right size. The color was as described. And the have lasted for a few months with no problems. I wash them in the washing machine and hang dry them. The sizing issue is why I only rated it at 3 stars. Other wise it would of been a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: Practical and Elegant at the Right Price
customer_reviews.text: My back is always chafed. Satin against the skin helps me to slide on the sheets, reducing inflammation. And I look elegant when I slouch around the house or go out to grab another oxygen cylinder from the car.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Best......Pajamas......EVER
customer_reviews.text: These are the best pajamas ever. I bought these to complete my transformation into an old man. At 39 that may sound young, however, I already have a grand baby and needed something to make me feel older. They do actually fit perfectly. I am 5' 11 3/4" (YES, the 3/4 matters) 195 lbs. The arm length is perfect as well as the pants. My wife loves them as well. So, that's a bonus. Anyways, I would recommend these to anyone looking for a good set of pj's or who are looking to complete the old man transformation like myself.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.B.

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pjs. Fit as expectes. I washed them by themselves on delicate setting with warm water. Seller reccomends using cold water. I dry alone on normal heat setting. Seller reccomends very low heat. No issues with wash and dry. Color remained the same. The color for me does not bleed and transfer to other items like furniture/bedding. I like to be cool when I sleep and these have been great. No stickiness or sweating in these. They feel like you have your sheets wrapped around you cozily all night.
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy

customer_reviews.title: Super product
customer_reviews.text: I have used Penny's product in the past but needed new pajamas. I tried all three of the Penny products that are now available and found each to be unsatisfactory. So, I though I would give these a try. I didn't have anything to lose because I could return them free of charge if they didn't work for me. To my delight, they worked great. They look, fit and feel great. I love them. Hope they are available the next time I need a pajama set.
customer_reviews.author: Donald E. Null

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable PJs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the light gray size 1X. The material is heavenly. Smooth and cool to the touch. I washed them with my regular laundry in warm water and placed in the dryer on medium. I removed them after 20 minutes and they were dry and wrinkle free! The fit is a bit weird. The waist is somewhat snug but still fits. There is no adjustment on the waist like a second snap. The leg length was perfect for me at 5'6" so I wonder how they would fit a taller person. The sleeve lengths are a bit long. Overall I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Neettweet

customer_reviews.title: Weird sizing & color difference
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend. The sizing was weird. The pants and sleeves were super long but the shoulders were too tight. Also, I ordered what looked like a light purple but the actual material was a gray color. I returned the whole set and went with a different brand. The material was soft but not very good quality. I felt like it might rip if he moved in them too much.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylin

customer_reviews.title: Valentines Day Gift was a hit!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my BF as a Valentines Day Gift and he loved them! Beautiful and vibrant Navy Blue color, super silky and soft! Nice quality and fit! He’s a small guy (5’8) and based on the reviews, I got him the Medium size. A little long and only slightly large, but he claims he likes the way they fit and are very comfortable! He’s been wearing them a lot, so I know he loves them and they were an unexpected surprise! Recently bought Robe from your company/brand too! See my separate review..💙💙❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Patti

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful on the Sizes
customer_reviews.text: The fabric and construction are fabulous. If the size was true I'd give it 5 stars. I should have paid closer attention to the other reviews saying these run very large. I bought size XL for a man who is 6'1, 200 lbs. Pants size for him is 36x32. He is lost in the size XL which is his normal size. If we reorder we will size down to a Large. Other than that, these are so worth the price and are really very nice.
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: Super sexy silky pajamas
customer_reviews.text: These are super sexy and silky. They are very comfortable and amazing to wear to bed or around the house. The burgundy is very nice and the quality is excellent. I am 5’9” 180bls and got a medium. The waist band is extra stretchy and fits perfect. A++ you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Two big problems: 1. Almost all of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Two big problems: 1. Almost all of the seams are unraveling 2. The inside is a completely different texture from the outside. The inside is rough while the outside is smooth.
customer_reviews.author: miyagi

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and hold up well
customer_reviews.text: This is my 8th or 9th pair of Del Rossa satin pajamas and robe sets. Great quality and hold up well. I'm becoming like Huge Hefner and spending all my free time in Del Rossa satin pj's. They look and feel GREAT ,

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably good PJ's.

I'm 6' 3" and the legs are a little short and the waist a bit tight (I take a 37 in the waist), even though I ordered the Large size. Should have gone one more with XL, but was afraid they would be too baggy. But these are good pajamas and the satin material is cool and comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Very well made; not the cheapest but as good or better than sets that cost twice as much.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality! They look and feel like sets that cost twice as much; sturdy and smooth fabric-they feel very well made. Pockets in the pants is the only thing that could make these better. Don’t look any further; I did my research for weeks before settling on these for my husband. He LOVES them in the navy blue with white piping. Very classy and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Fleur Sauvage

customer_reviews.title: It is very comfy and if I liked pajamas, I would definitely wear it
customer_reviews.text: Bought as part of a Hef costume. It is very comfy and if I liked pajamas, I would definitely wear it. . I am 5"11" and very thin though broad shouldered. The medium shoulders hang off my shoulders, the pants are over long for me and there is plenty of room in the waist. .If I were to do it over, I would get a small, but I barely got this in time to wear to the costume party. So though it is in mint condition I cannot justify returning it for a size small and certainly not a refund. It was great for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Winton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these! They are finely made and supper soft. He said they don't make him hot. They run a little slim but he's over 6 foot and they fit. During COVID-19 we have started having pajama night parties with our 2 grown kids and our youngest and these complete the look and the feel of how family time should be
customer_reviews.author: Haley Bassham

customer_reviews.title: These are satin, not silk
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's obvious to others that these are satin and not silk, but I somehow missed that. Satin is so staticky these were unwearable. The Men's large in tall was the right fit, but the fabric just didn't meet expectations and they were returned.
customer_reviews.author: stacyo

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and fit as expected.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking pair of men’s pajamas. However, I have no idea how they will hold up to washing and wearing over any length of time. The fabric is not heavy - as is to be expected from the price. It is just so hard to find men’s pajamas made of a nice fabric.
customer_reviews.author: cWallin

customer_reviews.title: Great fit. Compliments their other pieces
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Compliments their other pieces. Read other reviews (thanks eyeryone) and they were on point. Once you try this brand, you will never buy anywhere else. My gift fit a 5'10" solid person with no problem. Enough length and room to be very comfortable. Very silky, rich feel.

customer_reviews.title: LOW to NO quality

The top fits loose but not too big. The pants are not too short. Would prefer a drawstring but not a deal breaker since they fit. The satin feels nice, looks nice on me. Looking forward to next pajama party.
customer_reviews.author: rkw

customer_reviews.title: Who were these made for?
customer_reviews.text: Top width is fine but arms a little tight and long. Bottoms are totally too small in waist and way too long in length. Material is really nice
customer_reviews.author: Finlay Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get the correct size

customer_reviews.author: JMercado

customer_reviews.title: just what he wanted (when he asked for "silk" pajamas)
customer_reviews.text: My husband hates pjs and sleeps in the buff if he has a chance. But with a trip to visit family looming, he asked me for some silk pjs, so he could roll around easily in bed with them on. Having had expensive experiences with silk blouses, I figured that satin would work better, and so far, we are very pleased with these. We ordered the 2X and they are a bit too long in the arms and legs for my 5'10" 235 lb. husband, but we needed the room around the butt (which they have!) Nice fabric and finish and enough drape that they look expensive. Would give as a gift and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: T. Osgood

customer_reviews.title: Incredible quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these silk pajamas as a Christmas gift for my grandfather. Incredible quality for the price. They have been washed several times in the last month, and are holding up well. I bought the lighter pair of pjs to avid the dye issue mentioned in other reviews.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and Quality for Husbands Satin Pj!s

customer_reviews.title: It would take a giant to fill these pants

customer_reviews.title: thunder thighs beware

customer_reviews.title: Rich color, soft fabric
customer_reviews.text: So comfy! Soft, and such a rich, lucious color. They are polyester, and normally I would hate that, but these don't have that creepy, nasty feeling poly usually has. Overall, a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Leiah

customer_reviews.title: For when you want to look rich but feel so so
customer_reviews.text: Wearing this feels like it's straight out of a 90's porno or something. It's alright, but it's not exactly a fancy item even though it tries to fit that niche. Anyways, it's silky smooth, but not very breathable, at least it doesn't feel that way. I think what makes me dislike it is it's "squeaky", not sure how best else to describe it.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Economical Luxury of Excellent Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 7 pairs of these Pajamas for my father with health issues. He is a larger man and is difficult to buy for. The material is of excellent quality. It is nice to the touch,looks expensive, washes well and hold up to daily wear. Besides, who doesn't want to look good when you feel bad. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel and well made, but run about a size large and at 6' 0" I don't need longs.
customer_reviews.text: They are well made and feel great. I ordered according to my size and they are one size too large. The sleeves are about 4" too long, but no big deal. I will likely buy another set but in a smaller size and not long.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Engle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these pajamas in 2016 and have been wearing them since. This year I lost a lot of weight and needed a smaller size. Immediately thought of theses pajamas. Would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Esposito

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pajama set for my husband a year ago. He loves it so much that wears it every day and it still looks new. It has a very good quality, I wash it every week with regular laundry and it comes out perfectly with no wrinkles. It looks luxurious and feels very comfy. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Aida

customer_reviews.title: Not good for gifting.
customer_reviews.text: I thought for the price the quality would be better. This is a gift, and there is a strange stain right next to the collar which is immediately noticeable. Many frays on just the visible parts from what I can see which makes me a disappointed. I can’t tell you how bad I want to wash these because of the stain but it won’t look new and I am giving this away tomorrow. Wouldn’t recommend to gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: This is not my first purchase of these PJs. Got them for my husband for Christmas. The fabric isn’t flimsy or poorly sewn. He likes them and they launder well.
customer_reviews.author: barbara b

customer_reviews.title: Great pajamas for hubby who’s always hot at night
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set as a gift for my fiancé for our Christmas Eve pajama tradition. He absolutely loves them. He’s never owned satin pajamas so he was weary at first but said they are the most comfortable pair of pajamas he has. He had a problem with always being too hot at night and he said his favorite part about these are that they keep him cool. Product arrived packaged well and true to size and color displayed.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Short

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Material feels good and very comfortable to sleep in! I dont like how thin the pajamas are, It almost feels like a pillow case made into pajamas if that makes since lol but the price was cheap so I can’t really complain. Wearing size small
customer_reviews.author: Sean N.

customer_reviews.title: Silky!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought these for my boyfriend to wear to a holiday costume party we were attending. I sewed some sherpa fleece to the collar and cuffs so he could be Santa (Santa costumes were too pricey, and this was at least had a non-frivolous use!) He really likes them, and now wears them as full time pajamas.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty39

customer_reviews.title: Waist cut too small
customer_reviews.text: The material is nice and silky and the top fits well. However the waist is very small. I ordered a size large for my father however the waist is the size of a small. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: love but rip at seams easily.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased probably 40 PJ's from this company. the newer ones seem to not be sewn as well as I am seeing them all rip along the seams. so disappointed.. I love them otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: MaryBeth Seybold

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I expected it to be too hot for the summer. However is breaths better than I would have expected given the price. Caution: stains easily. And watch out if you have a cat that likes to get on your chest. Claws will snag and you won't be able to give it the ol' tug to straighten out.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W.

customer_reviews.title: Misleading reviews would not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Material feels nice had a smell to it so it was washed. It snags easy so and get all these little strings and when you pull to remove the whole material crunches up. Extremely cheap. Would not purchase again. I done know why such great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: D. Girl

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves them.
customer_reviews.text: I do too they are soft. quick and easy shipping. Heads up, I would take them right out of the dryer or they may end up wrinkled. No pic because he is wearing them. lol. Came in plastic easy for me to gift wrap for fathers day. thank you.
customer_reviews.author: natosha rowe

customer_reviews.title: My husband was thrilled with these!
customer_reviews.text: I surprised him with some "silky" pj's and he loves them! The legs are a little wide all the way to the floor (he says) & the top is a little long on him but it's better that they are more "roomy" than too tight. The Large size would have probably been too small for him (he wears a 36-38 pant/jean size). They are cool & comfortable to sleep & lounge around in and the solid black with gold trim is perfect for him! I have one very 'happy camper'!! I'm not sure how they will 'hold up' over time as he's only had them a week.
customer_reviews.author: K. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loved these! He’s a size large, 34” waist, 29” inseam...pants are a little long but that’s ok. Quality of silk/poly is great and nice piping throughout.
customer_reviews.author: Mequon Katie

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: These were bought for a 6'3" gentleman and they fit perfectly. I worried about the pants not fitting in length but they were just right in length, not to short. The button holes for the shirt were nice and tight so no worry of the buttons coming undone easily. In fact there were a little too snug and I thought perhaps they weren't going to go through but they did just fine. The sleeves were also just the right length for his long arms. The over all construction seemed to be very nice. The price was reasonable for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: shoppingmom

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love these pajamas. I don't think I got a sleep mask with mine, but I wasn't going to use it anyway and I could've missed it. These are every bit as comfortable as I expected. The legs are a little long and I occasionally step on the bottoms - My pants size is about 33" waist & 30" length and I got a medium - but I don't really care since these are pajamas. I'm not quite sure how these will hold up... I've seen a few loose threads and I have had them for a little over a month now. Like the title says, they are good considering the $40 price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. Great deal for the price. Will definitely buy again. Always fast delivery by Amazon 😁
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift but the person loved he way it looked. It was somewhat large but alright since it was for lounging around the house. The fabric was thin and fresh so it is put to great use now in the summer.

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels good

customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as a costume for a play and they worked great and fit as expected. The color though was much more on a burgundy side than a red.
customer_reviews.author: LisaMarie Atchley

customer_reviews.title: Bought for husband's recovery
